Hi Claudia, I'm not sure, because I can't check well your workflow. But, as you said, this could be related to:
1) mesh construction by points
2) how you set the function inside evaluate GH component
It seems an issue of order the list. Anyhow, you can test this small example that I prepared for you. it requires a MeshEdit component, you can find it on Food4Rhino. I suggest that you use analysis mesh output instead of points. Let me know if it works. - Antonello
